title: Best Utility Services Regulations
description: In 2024, Slovakia achieved a high score of 91.74 in the quality of regulations on utility services, indicating strong regulatory frameworks.

title: Longest Secondary Education Duration
description: As of 2023, Slovakia offers a secondary education duration of 9 years, one of the longest in the world.

title: Lowest Gini Index
description: In 2022, Slovakia had a Gini index of 24.1, indicating a low level of income inequality.

title: Lowest Customs and Import Duties
description: In 2022, Slovakia had one of the lowest customs and import duties, contributing only 0.00014% to tax revenue.

title: Lowest Net ODA to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Slovakia provided a very low net ODA to the least developed countries, amounting to only 0.00062% of its GNI.
